Bo-Lin Li（李柏霖）   Li Bolin was born in Hunan, China in March 2001. He joined Wang Group in 2022 and began his undergraduate research. The main work is the synthesis and derivatization of belt[4] arene[4]tropilidenes, including the introduction of different substituents and metal coordination ions, in order to obtain new catalysts with inherent chirality ligands.

Yang Chao（晁阳）   Yang Chao was born in Henan, China. In 2016, he received a bachelor’s degree from Henan University. He moved to Tianjin University for pursuit MS and PhD degree from 2017 to 2024. Then he joined MSACL as a postdoctor in Tsinghua University. He enjoys traveling, listening music.
Education 2012-2016 B.S. College of pharmacy, Henan University, China, Pharmaceutic Preparation
2017-2020 MS, School of Pharmaceutical Science and Technology, Tianjin University，China, Medicinal Chemistry，Supervisor：Prof. Andrew C.-H. Sue
2020-2024 PhD, School of Pharmaceutical Science and Tchnology, Tianjin University, China, Applied Chemistry，Supervisor：Prof. Han Zuilhof
Work experience 2024-present, post doctor, Tsinghua University, Supervisor: Prof. Mei-Xiang Wang.
